text: The 2000 MLB Japan All-Star Series was the seventh edition of the championship, a best-of-eight series between the All-Star teams from Major League Baseball (MLB) and Nippon Professional Baseball (NPB). MLB won the series by 5–2–1 and Barry Bonds was named MVP. == Results == Championship {| class="wikitable" |- ! Game !! Winning Team !! Score !! Losing Team !!
